description:
Cancel a complete order or a subset of lines.

The order can be identified by an OrderID or by BackendID + BackendSystemID, the lines can be identified by an OrderLineID or by BackendID.

The result will tell you if it was successful.

BackendID.description: Reference to the order that is being cancelled - required when `OrderID` is omitted

BackendSystemID.description: Reference to the system from which the order originated - required when `OrderID` is omitted

OrderID.description: ID of the order that is being cancelled - required when `BackendID` and `BackendSystemID` are omitted

OrderLines.description: Lines to cancel - or, if none are specified, all open lines of the order will be cancelled
